div.div: Attribution of drivers using model hindcasts of the global fishery.
div.p: All simulations assume OA, and each varies only the forcing specified; all other ecosystem and economic dynamics are solved prognostically. The average ex-vessel price of fish ( a) and cost of fishing per unit effort ( b) are derived from observations, while technological progress is imposed as a constant rate of catchability increase of ( c) 2, ( d) 5 and ( e) 8% per year.
